attributes.action: Halt the privatisation of policing services
attributes.additional_details: Private Security organisations have proved themselves unreliable in providing 'policing services'  They are motivated to serve the interests of shareholders and not the public.  The public have a right to expect and demand of Government that policing services remain in publicly controlled hands to whom they (the police) are ultimately accountable. Further such intended privatisations must cease - in the light and experience of recent events.
